mapper.select: select class_no classNo, class_name className, substr(class_name_address,1,5) classNameAdd, class_image classImg, class_price classPrice from class where class_price = 0 limit 4
select class_no classNo, class_name className, substr(class_name_address,1,5) classNameAdd, class_image classImg, class_price classPrice from class where class_price != 0 limit 4
select class_no classNo, class_name className, substr(class_name_address,1,5) classNameAdd, class_image classImg, class_price classPrice from class order by class_no desc limit 0, 4

select c.class_no classNo, c.class_name className, substr(c.class_name_address,1,5) classNameAdd, c.class_image classImg, c.class_price classPrice from class c join cate2 c2 join cate1 c1 where c.cate2_no = c2.cate2_no and c2.cate1_no = c1.cate1_no and c1.cate1_no = #{no}
